009package Ch13_Color_Images;
010
011import java.awt.image.ColorModel;
012import java.awt.image.IndexColorModel;
013
014import ij.IJ;
015import ij.ImagePlus;
016import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
017import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
018import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
019import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
020import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
021
022import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
023
024/**
025 * <p>
026 * ImageJ plugin, increases the brightness of an indexed color image by 10 units (each color component). See Sec. 13.1
027 * (Prog. 13.3) of [1] for details. Note that only the color model (RGB lookup table) of the image is changed while the
028 * actual pixel values are not modified.
029 * </p>
030 * <p>
031 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer
032 * (2022).
033 * </p>
034 *
035 * @author WB
036 */
037public class Brighten_Index_Image implements PlugInFilter {
038        
039        private static int BrightnessDelta = 10;        // increase by 10 units
040
041        /**
042         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image is currently open.
043         */
044        public Brighten_Index_Image() {
045                if (noCurrentImage()) {
046                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.FlowerIdx256);
047                }
048        }
049        
050        @Override
051        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
052                return DOES_8G + DOES_8C;       // this plugin works on indexed color images 
053        }
054
055        @Override
056        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
057                ColorModel cm =  ip.getColorModel();
058                if (!(cm instanceof IndexColorModel)) {
059                        IJ.error("Color model not of type IndexedColorModel");
060                        return;
061                }
062
063                if (!runDialog()) {
064                        return;
065                }
066
067                IndexColorModel icm = (IndexColorModel) cm;
068                int pixBits = icm.getPixelSize(); 
069                int nColors = icm.getMapSize(); 
070                
071                //retrieve the current lookup tables (maps) for R,G,B
072                byte[] rMap = new byte[nColors]; 
073                byte[] gMap = new byte[nColors]; 
074                byte[] bMap = new byte[nColors];
075                
076                icm.getReds(rMap);  
077                icm.getGreens(gMap);
078                icm.getBlues(bMap);  
079                
080                // modify the lookup tables     only
081                for (int idx = 0; idx < nColors; idx++){ 
082                        int r = 0xff & rMap[idx];       //mask to treat as unsigned byte 
083                        int g = 0xff & gMap[idx];
084                        int b = 0xff & bMap[idx];
085
086                        rMap[idx] = clamp(r + BrightnessDelta);
087                        gMap[idx] = clamp(g + BrightnessDelta);
088                        bMap[idx] = clamp(b + BrightnessDelta);
089                }
090                
091                //create a new color model and apply to the image
092                IndexColorModel icm2 = new IndexColorModel(pixBits, nColors, rMap, gMap, bMap);  
093                ip.setColorModel(icm2);
094        }
095
096        private byte clamp(int val) {
097                if (val < 0) return (byte) 0;
098                if (val > 255) return (byte) 255;
099                return (byte) val;
100        }
101
102        private boolean runDialog() {
103                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
104                gd.addNumericField("Brightness delta", BrightnessDelta, 0);
105
106                gd.showDialog();
107                if(gd.wasCanceled())
108                        return false;
109
110                BrightnessDelta = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
111                return true;
112        }
113
114}
115
